description:
The Tennis Club is having their New Years bash. All together again, Ayu and Tatsuya are arguing as usual. Everyone is going to Ayu's house for her family's New Years tradition.
To Ayu's surprise, Mamour reveals his love to her. Ayu does not know how to respond. Because Ayu is secretly in love with Tatsuya, although they always rub each other the wrong way. But love is twisted ad and you never know how it will end up. Who will win her heart and her body?
title: Class Reunion Again: All about Ayu
